unnormalised: Arre yaar, aikla tuka tea case-ache vishayant, State vs. Sharma? Kitlo bhangar! Dista Sharma-cher book kela Sec. 307 IPC hantun – murder korpak prayatn. Police waley mhantaat tannem aplea padoshiak danda maarlya parking-achea zagya vellyar jhagra zalea uprant. FIR no. asa 123/2024, local PS-ant file kelam. Court-ichi tarik asa 15/09/24. Dekoia, kiteam ghoddta, umed asa niai mellat!
normalised: Arre yaar, aiklay tem State versus Sharma case-achem? Pissachem kaam! Dista Sharma-cher section teen shem ani saat I-P-C-achea antarga-taar book kela – murder korpak prayatna. Police walanchem mhan’nnem asa tannem aplea padoshik parkingacher jhagra zalea uprant dandan marla. F-I-R number asa ek shem ani teis slash don hazar ani teis file kela local P-S-ant. Court-achi tarik fix kelya pandhra september don hazar ani teis. Polleun gheum kitem zata, n’yaay mellonk favo mhunn asha kortam!
